.. _process_pipe_2d:

process example: process_pipe_2d
================================

This example shows how nmrglue can be used to process NMR data.  In this 
script a 2D time domain NMRPipe file is processing into a 2D NMRPipe 
frequency domain file. After processing the resulting file is compared to
one processed with NMRPipe.


[`source code <el/processing/process_pipe_2d.py>`_]

.. literalinclude:: el/processing/process_pipe_2d.py
